name: Drench (itch) (Arcus)
description:
This game was baced off the game Drench, a strategy game, where you have to match the colours on screen to the top right colour. It is a simple game, and is easy to learn. 

When you press a button, all surounding colours that match become part of the bigger shape. You have a set number of attempts, but if you beat it before the game runs out of attempts, the size of the game increces.
